headline: Nasdaq Governance Shift Puts SEC Approved Charter Changes In Focus
summary: Nasdaq's charter amendment introducing limited officer exculpation has been approved by the SEC and is now effective. The amendment also broadens the Board of Directors' evaluation powers to include factors such as overall market stability and regulatory obligations when reviewing major corporate actions. The changes follow prior shareholder approval and apply at both the corporate level and the regulatory subsidiary level. NasdaqGS:NDAQ now trades around $98.5, with the stock up 22.8% over...

headline: Nasdaq Earnings: What To Look For From NDAQ
summary: Global exchange operator Nasdaq (NASDAQ:NDAQ) will be announcing earnings results this Thursday before market open. Here’s what to expect.
